ns2:test-suite.name: As a Demoblaze user I should be able to login and purchase products from the App

test-case.name: Login into the application and purchase products
test-case.title: Login into the application and purchase products

step.name: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.demoblaze.com/index.html"
step.title: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.demoblaze.com/index.html"

step.name: Then I click on sign in button and wait for sign in page
step.title: Then I click on sign in button and wait for sign in page

step.name: Then I should see Sign In Page
step.title: Then I should see Sign In Page

step.name: And I clear cart items if any
step.title: And I clear cart items if any

step.name: Then I click home button from menu bar to continue shopping
step.title: Then I click home button from menu bar to continue shopping

step.name: Then I navigate to different product categories from left menu
step.title: Then I navigate to different product categories from left menu

step.name: Then I choose laptop Sony vaio i5 and added to the cart
step.title: Then I choose laptop Sony vaio i5 and added to the cart

step.name: Then I choose laptop Dell i7 8gb and added to the cart
step.title: Then I choose laptop Dell i7 8gb and added to the cart

step.name: Then I opt to delete laptop Dell i7 8gb from the cart
step.title: Then I opt to delete laptop Dell i7 8gb from the cart

step.name: Then I capture amount to be paid
step.title: Then I capture amount to be paid

step.name: And click on place order button
step.title: And click on place order button

step.name: Then I enter Name as "Tom" and Country as "Denmark" and City as "xyza" and Card as "1234" and Month as "Nov" and Year as "2020"
step.title: Then I enter Name as "Tom" and Country as "Denmark" and City as "xyza" and Card as "1234" and Month as "Nov" and Year as "2020"

step.name: And I click on purchase order button
step.title: And I click on purchase order button

step.name: Then I capture Order details and verify with expected amount
step.title: Then I capture Order details and verify with expected amount

step.name: And I Click on Ok button
step.title: And I Click on Ok button

label.name: story
label.value: Login into the application and purchase products

label.name: feature
label.value: As a Demoblaze user I should be able to login and purchase products from the App

label.name: feature
label.value: As a Demoblaze user I should be able to login and purchase products from the App
